thread.section_title: Science News and Analysis - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The 10-Point.

author: Gerard Baker
title: The 10-Point.
text:
Good morning,
Face the Music
The crisis enveloping Facebook shows no sign of abating. Mark Zuckerberg, the company’s CEO, said he made a “huge mistake” by not focusing on potential abuse of users’ personal information, as the social-media giant he founded revealed data breaches that were far more extensive than previously known. Mr. Zuckerberg’s most direct mea culpa to date came on the same day Facebook disclosed that data from as many as 87 million users, most of them in the U.S., may have been improperly shared with an analytics...
